text: :For the son of Nicholas II, see Alexei Nikolaevich, Tsarevich of Russia Alexei Petrovich Romanov () ( â€“ ), was a Russian Tsarevich. He was born in Moscow, the son of Tsar Peter I and his first wife Eudoxia Lopukhina. Category:1690 births Category:1718 deaths Category:Russian princes and princesses Category:House of Romanov
title: Tsarevich Alexei Petrovich of Russia
